name: Bongo
0:
”Alexa, ask Bon Go for bus times at stop one zero five zero”
”Alexa, ask Bon Go if there's buses soon”
”Alexa, ask Bon Go if there's buses soon at ten fifty”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bon go
des: Ask Bon Go "When the bus will come to stop (ex: one zero five zero)", and Alexa will let you know which routes will arrive within the next 30 minutes. There are also some locations that have been enabled by their name, like Burge Hall, (or any resident hall), or "The Library".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
